Datasource.Parameter: (select * from planet_osm_polygon where landuse='cemetery' OR landuse='vineyard' OR landuse='village_green' OR landuse='plant_nursery' OR landuse='forest' OR landuse='allotments' OR boundary='national_park' OR leisure='nature_reserve' OR leisure='pitch' OR leisure='golf_course' OR leisure='sports_centre' OR "natural"='wood' ) as dark_green
